# Hello World {#intro}

```{r load_data}
## Load in the data
load("college.Rdata")
```

*Summarizing Data*

```{r summarize}
## What's the average median debt?
sc%>%summarize(mean_debt=mean(debt_mdn,na.rm=TRUE))
```

*Stretch Items*

```{r combining commands}
## What's the average earnings for very selective schools?
sc%>%filter(adm_rate<.1)%>%summarize(mean_debt=mean(md_earn_ne_pg,na.rm=TRUE))

## And for not very selective schools?
sc%>%filter(adm_rate>.3)%>%summarize(mean_debt=mean(md_earn_ne_pg,na.rm=TRUE))
```
